EventDefinition.Comment: Nav LED: Off when NAV1 is Inactive
Nav LED: On when NAV1 is Active
Set OBS1 to direct course to GPS waypoint
Oil Temp/Pressure Circuit (15) should be on before warning.
Warning for fuel flow out of range (according to manual) OR selector set to 'OFF'.
Turn off LED when AP Approach Mode is inactive.
Flash when AP Approach Mode is armed but not captured.
Turn LED on when AP Approach Mode is Active and approach is captured.

ProfileInformation.Author: captbinkbonk
ProfileInformation.Description:
Bravo

  • Annunciator Test Button not wired into Bravo annunciator lights
